text.section:
Any person whose application for a pharmacy permit has been denied or whose pharmacy permit has been suspended or revoked under this title may:
Appeal that action to the Board of Review; and
Then take any further appeal allowed by the Administrative Procedure Act.
If an appeal is taken under this section, the Board may stay its order of suspension or revocation pending the decision of the court.
